joining_fee: Nil for Insignia Preferred Banking Customer. ₹7,000 + GST for Others
renewal_fee: Nil for Insignia Preferred Banking Customer. ₹7,000 + GST for Others
welcome_benefits: 28,000 Reward Points (For Those With Fee Variant)

Movie & Dining: Flat Rs. 500 off on movie tickets on BookMyShow, Priority reservations, and personalized hospitality from the chef with an exclusive dining program.
Rewards Rate: 5 Reward Points per Rs. 100 spent on domestic transactions, 10 Reward Points per Rs. 100 spent on international transactions.
Reward Redemption: Reward Points redeemable for e-vouchers, mobile recharges, flight bookings, etc. 1 RP = Re 0.25 (approx)
Travel: You get complimentary domestic as well as international lounge access.
Domestic Lounge Access: 2 Complimentary Domestic Lounge Access Per Quarter
International Lounge Access: 6 complimentary international lounge access every year via Priority Pass
Golf: 4 complimentary rounds of green fees every year, 12 complimentary golf lessons every year.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Waiver of Annual Charges on Spends of ₹10 Lakh in a Year (Valid for Fee Variant)
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waived for transactions between Rs. 500 and Rs. 4,000 (max cap Rs. 250 per month applicable)
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the transaction amount, subject to a minimum charge of Rs. 500

product_details: 5 Reward Points for every ₹100 spent on domestic transactions.
10 Reward Points for every ₹100 spent on international transactions.
2 complimentary lounge access every quarter across airports in India.
Priority Pass membership with 6 complimentary international lounge visits every calendar year.
Benefits worth ₹8,000 on expenditure of ₹8 lakh in the previous year.
Flat ₹500 off on movie ticket bookings on BookMyShow.
24×7 concierge service for assistance regarding all kinds of bookings.
1% fuel surcharge waiver for transactions between ₹500 and ₹4,000 (max waiver capped at ₹250 per month).
